name: @dpwiese/react-native-canvas-charts
description: WebView wrapper for using canvas based charts in React Native
author: Daniel Wiese <dpwiese@gmail.com> (https://danielwiese.com)

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && babel src --out-dir dist --extensions '.ts,.tsx' --copy-files && tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly && cp -rf package.json dist && cp -rf README.md dist
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo "Error: Don't run 'npm publish' in root. Use 'npm run publish' instead." && exit 1
